item.title:
Lily Gladstone had been considering a career change prior to ‘KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON.’
She was in the process of registering for a data analytics course, before a Gmail notification alerted her to a request for a Zoom meeting with Martin Scorsese.
http://bit.ly/3pThIuO
